reviews.text: One of the most ancient and without exaggeration is the most stunning temple of the Kazan Kremlin. Just look at this floor, the stones of which rubbed with millions of feet over hundreds of years. A stunning painting of the walls and ceiling vaults sends us to the best pictorial works of the Middle Ages.
Beautiful cathedral with amazing ornaments in characteristic blue color. Great to see day or night
It is a beautiful Cathedral.
Night is perfect while there is no one
Nice

Stately building. The architecture is somewhat reminiscent of the Gothic style. The building has an organ hall. This temple has become the lucky card of the city. The only thing that prevents him from looking more convincing is the building of the city municipality. I recommend to visit.
This one of the Kharkov iconic places.
Very Nice

The Bell Tower is an architectural dominant of the city.
In fact, all the major streets of the center focus on it.
It stands at the end of a long hill, flanked by two rivers flow.
This hill reminds the form of the tongue.
In the past, the Golden dome of the Bell Tower was visible for many kilometers around.
Bell Tower has served as a Beacon for the merchants and traders.
Nice impressive

very nice temple
Не знаю,  как правильно описывать места данной категории... но церковь НОРМАЛЬНАЯ.  Нормальныйе служители, службы. Кормят бездомных. Расскажут,  посоветуют.
Молитовна атмосфера в церкві! Є вишиті ікони! Недолік - належить до Московського патріярхату.
Отличный супермаркет, доступные цены,всегда все свежее. Радует ассортимент, достаточно широкий.  Имеется касса самообслуживания, где можно расплатиться как наличкой ,так и картой.

One of several modern art galleries in Kharkiv 
Has great exhibition agenda 
Host lot of independent artists 
Inspires cultural exchange 
Polite highly professional and friendly staff 
Highly recommend for all Kharkiv visitors and modern art lovers 
Cozy and nice place
Art. New look.

Удивительно работает Gogle Maps.  На днях я заглядывать в Наследник, а сегодня они интересуются, как мне Come in gallery. Не все же знают, что это в одном подъезде находится.

Хорошо, что я была в ней однажды на лекции Макса Розенфельда. Он тогда еще много рассказывал о Макаренко.

Место понравилось. Светлое, просторное. Тепло встречали. Надо заглядывать почаще в Галерею, а не только в Нахлебник.
Чудова галерея з привітним персоналом! Завжди цікаві сучасні виставки :)
Побывали первый раз здесь на выставке. Спокойная атмосфера.
Má administração do poder público. Patrimônio histórico, sem seu devido valor por mídias, pelo  governo, total falta de respeito, valorização.
variedade muito grande pra conhecer bastante oisa
Bom para ter lazer
Local de fácil acesso e um clima de paz
.Muito  bom  pra saber istorias de bauru um ótimo lazer
Brilliant place, great exhibits, I was lucky enough to have a private guide but I am sure it will be great even without that perk.

I believe a large portion is under renovation until the next year. The entrance is on the back side and only marked with a sign next to a solid wood door. Also, the staff are adamant that you walk in a continuous circle, starting at the left side of each room. I poked my head in one section and kept walking and one of the staff members made me go back and walk through the entire room (I wasn't going to argue). Maybe they're trying to gain more interest through over exposure, or maybe they have experienced some vandalism and are trying to track people as they walk through the rooms. Who knows. But basically, I was never in a section by myself.

Anyway, good, typical museum. I'm sure the renovations will add some quality to the place. Lots of recent stuff from Maidan and the Donbass.
Excellent museum,don't miss it.
You can learn many things about Kharkiv and Ukrainian history, but on if you can understand Ukrainian or Russian. Because they don't have English guide or any other languages.
Two floors have some English support. First floor is about earlier settlers.

Найкращий музей Харкова! Цікавезні експозиції і чудові люди, безліч заходів і активностей - це все Харківський літмузей!!!
Місце, де цікаво бути та можна поспілкуватися з чудовими людьми! Раджу прийти сюди на екскурсію! А 15 вересня 2018 року літмузей відзначає 30 років!
Один з кращих в Харкoвi - це точно.
Cognitive and interesting place with a lot of pictures and sculptures about sexual cultures of different countries. I recommend to take excursion of the museum guide.

A nice place for visiting 😉 and enjoy the old stories about sex education and pleasure. Some photos and interesting paintings also there . 40 грн entrance ticket , the staff is good. Recommended place !!
One of just 12 sex museums around world. Interesting but liitle out dated. Could be inspiring for couples. Russian language comprehension required.
You will learn a lot about sex and how ancestors use to have sex from allover the world
This is not a museum and collection of photos all from the Internet. Disliked

Находящаяся на улице Полтавский шлях пожарная часть №20 располагается в уникальном здании — памятнике архитектуры местного значения, построенном в 1845 году. На сегодняшний день это здание пожарной части является самым старым среди подобных на Украине.

Залопанская (находящаяся за рекой Лопань) пожарная часть №3 ведет начало своей славной летописи с начала 19 века, когда по замыслу архитектора А.Алферова была построена подобающая ей большая трехэтажная станция с одноэтажными окрылками и высокой башней-каланчой. 

На территории части располагались личный состав подразделения пожарной охраны, конюшни и конно-бочечные хода. Кроме этого, рядом было пристроено полицейское управление и помещение для содержания арестантов. Все это составило единый архитектурный комплекс.

Здание выполнено в оригинальном «кирпичном» стиле и до конца века пожарная каланча оставалась чуть ли не самым главным и высоким смотровым объектом в городе

Поскольку с каланчи весь Харьков был виден, как на ладони. В будке наверху смотровой каланчи находился постовой и наблюдал за городом, в то время преимущественно застроенным деревянными постройками, так что пожары становились для жителей настоящим бедствием, а печное отопление являлось причиной 90% пожаров в Харькове. 

Заметив сильный дым над крышами, постовой подавал пожарной бригаде тревожный сигнал. В лютые морозы на каланче специально вывешивали сигнальные флаги, для напоминания горожанам о необходимости соблюдения пожарной безопасности. 

Даже в 1913 году спустя почти век после строительства башни, из 100 пожаров 70 было заметно с каланчи. В1908 г. здание пожарной части реконструировали по предложению архитектора Б.М. Корнеенко.

Сегодня из смотровой башни видна едва ли пятая часть современного Харькова. Ну а с массовым внедрением телефонной и мобильной связи башня потеряла актуальность. Но на первом этаже части, как и в далеком прошлом, и сегодня дежурят пожарные.
Башню-каланчу признали архитектурной ценностью, присвоив ей охранный номер.

Новый, 21 век, мало что изменил в жизни здания — здесь по-прежнему работают пожарные (теперь — Служба спасения МЧС) по соседству с милиционерами. В 2011 году на башню пожарной части установили флюгер.

Правда, в последние годы архитектурный памятник оказался на грани разрушения. Капитальный ремонт на каланче не проводился со времён строительства. Несколько лет назад в здании стала проседать кладка, рушились перекрытия, по несущим стенам пошли трещины. Усугубил разрушение здания еще один негативный фактор — вибрация от движения трамваев, автомобилей и поездов метро, проходящих в непосредственной близости от пожарной части.

Нарушившаяся гидроизоляция внизу здания вызвала отсырение внутренних стен. Арочные перемычки башни пришли в негодность. Власти признали ситуацию чрезвычайной, но выход из положения долго не находили по причине недостаточного финансирования объекта. 

Пожарная каланча рисковала обрушиться на головы спасателей и сотрудников райотдела милиции. И, хотя, часть тротуара закрыли защитной сеткой, бывали случаи, что кирпичи каланчи, падая на сетку, отлетали, вылетали на проезжую часть и падали на машины, припаркованные перед частью.

Харьковская каланча пережила две мировые войны, хотя построена она без фундамента, только с полуметровым заглублением в грунт. После решения вопроса по финансированию реконструкции, на каланче провели ремонтные работы и теперь можно снова подниматься по винтовой лестнице на смотровую площадку, не боясь провалиться.

Совместными усилиями удалось сохранить для Харькова один из самых старых архитектурных памятников девятнадцатого столетия. Таким образом, сегодня, как и много десятилетий назад, спасатели пожарной части могут продолжать оперативно ликвидировать пожары не только в половине районов Харькова, но даже и в ближайшем пригороде, вплоть до Люботина.
Триповерховий будинок, в якому розташована пожежна частина - це найдавніша будівля міста, збудована архітектором Алферовим у 1845 році.
Найстаріша пожежна частина в Харкові - і не тільки
Дуже гарний будинок
The place is being renovated and not opened to public now. I asked when it will be opened and was told till the work is done.
good place for kids
So nice place.. In spite the weather is snowy ☃
One of the greatest zoo in ex-USSR
Nice place to visit. But conditions for animals are much worse than they should be

In my opinion: 
If I could give The Briarcliff Manor below one star I would. We were about to put a deposit down on another venue this weekend, when I received an email from the Briarcliff Manor asking us to consider coming in for a tour.  I called and spoke with Kristina who transferred me to Emily who I then spoke with. I told her what I was being quoted from my other venues considered and she said she would be able to match it no problem. She then sent me an email confirming our discussion along with pricing and dates. We went the next day to tour the premises and met with both Emily and Perry who sat down with us explaining options. We took this all into consideration after leaving comparing prices and venues. I then reached out to Emily to further negotiate as we wanted to choose this venue. We came to an agreement in writing and made an appointment to sign the contract. Upon arrival to sign the contract, Perry and Emily start to renegotiate something different than what we had negotiated and confirmed the night before saying they couldn’t hold their end of the agreement. We politely said thank you and left. I tried speaking to Emily after expressing my confusion and displeasure with the situation and no effort was made to resolve this. We lost our other venue as we thought everything was a go here. As a bride, no woman ever wants to be more stressed than normal on such a memorable day. I have been envisioning the most perfect day since childhood even after my dad has died and won’t be present. Last night I envisioned what my night would be like here and I was excited to share it with the people I still have here. I left there today in tears. I hope this never happens to another person. I would not recommend this venue to anyone after my terrible experience.
Came here for my best friends wedding. The staff were amazing, food was delicious as well as the Drinks. The mansion was beautiful!

The Briarcliff Manor is a drop dead gorgeous venue!! But it's even more than that--the service you will receive there makes the whole experience even more worthwhile. The owners and workers are dedicated to making sure their customers are happy, and will go above and beyond to make each party special. You will not be disappointed and neither will your guests!
Beautiful mansion. My network group has meetings at this location and the place is just beautiful.

Great place wonderful service 
Loved the food and ambiance

Great exhibition place.
Often updates
Many independent artist can use it for their exhibition.
Visit it for new experience, should be in tourist guides, the Ermilov center

Highly recommend, for all visitors

Good place with great expositions.
Free enter)
Recommend to visit the exhibition of young artists in the City Gallery.

Место весьма не плохое, если вы не далеки от искусства. Часто проходят выставки и особенно интересно было, когда попал на второй день выставки, там  проходила встреча с художникоком, чьи картины сейчас там, его интересно было по слушать. Т.ч заглядывайте на сайт перед походом, что быть в курсе что там происходит)
Харків - місто авангарду, місто сучасного мистецтва. У Мініципальній галереї регулярно змінюються експозиції.

If you want to test France atmosphere, try to visit Paris cuisine. One of the very attractive places in Kharkov. Very romantic place with very tasty food and reasonable price. By the way, they claim that dogs are welcomed there. Besides the tasty food you will enjoy with interested movie. Also, on the top floor there are a greenery with lots of flowers.Very strong recommend place especially for dates. No access to disabled. Parking place along road, so there is parking difficulties.
Excellent place ! Excellent  ratio  of quality/price. Romantic place with few adorable cats :)

Amazing idea performed with upscale taste resulted in a fantastic restaurant. It represents 5 level dining where each level is decorated with its own twist keeping the general idea though. It can allocate a lot of visitors, however the majority of seating are 2-, 3-, maximum 4- seaters, which makes Paris fantastic place for dates or intimate friendly chatting. Generously decorated with live plants restaurant litteraly fills you with fresh air. Their menu deserves its own line: impressive wine cart, separate desserts offerings (not just a last page in main menu) combined with non-alcoholic drink, and main part that is strictly a No fast-food menu. They are very mindful about healthy eating which is vividly presented in their meals selection. Some meals comes in a generous portion, and they have specific sign next to its name in a menu, so that the guests can understand what to expect. There are free apples for kids next to the entrance, and free fresh juices for pregnant visitors. Prices are very adequate to the quality of the good and the level of the place itself. Would I come here again? Definitely!

A must visit when in Kharkiv, even if it's just a coffee and cake or pastry.  The restaurant has a take out bakery, a casual dining room and a more formal dining room.  It also has a small galley Cinema with cozy two person tables.  Full menu is served in any of these areas.  Lunch in the cinema room for 2, with cheese fondue, soup, and 2 main dishes (beef) was 590 UAH.

Indoor mall with Eiffel Tower replica in the parking lot.  Has a movie theater,  good food court and skating on occasion.  Was disappointed in the movie selection of theater and some stores close at 17:00 which was annoying. The lighting on the tower wasn't on when i was there.
This is one of the best restaurants in Kharkov, so if you want to find a good place to eat - this is your choice. Great for families too.
Nice place for a dinner in an intimate setting. Also did a company dinner with about 30 people in outside sitting.  Was an enjoyable time.
Many thanks for such an incredible meal yesterday ... and everyday!
Looks like u have nice meal...
Wonderful!

This place is value for money for local Ukrainian cuisine, this particular place is really big and good for all 3 meals without making a hole in your pocket. It has multiple floors so no problems of space like all other Ukrainian cafes which I don't like. It's a good place for business meeting and if you are coming with friends it's also good.
It’s one love;) Traditional Ukrainian cuisine, very tasty here with the usual price. I often eat there. Highly recommend!

Cafe to have a quick meal. Unlike most fast food places here you can buy cooked meal of Ukrainian cuisine. As it's a self-served Cafe the prices are not that high. Very comfy location just in a step from the biggest thermometer and Constitution square :)
Good place to get a lot of traditional Ukrainian cuisine for little money. Two floors and lots of space inside, nice 😃
Just super to spend time with lovely friends... And to test the drine vine...
This place is my favorite spot in Kharkov, nice coffee, the staffs are nice and friendly, Good deserts and most comfortable place to study. I rate coffee life 10/10
Have been there many times, but seems like closed now
Very good service and geeat atmosphere. Friendly staff.
If you want to have some coffee and a snack...
Very nice coffe shop 👍
